extendedIngredients.aisle: Nut butters, Jams, and Honey;Health Foods
extendedIngredients.name: honey

recipes.title: Get Tropical: Passionfruit + Mint Cocktail
recipes.instructions: Procedures                                                                              1                                                                            Scoop the flesh from the passionfruit into a cocktail shaker. Add the 3 sprigs of mint and muddle with the passionfruit in the bottom of the cocktail shaker.                                                                                                                            2                                                                            Add the gin and honey, then fill the shaker with ice. Shake for 10 seconds.                                                                                                                            3                                                                            Strain the mixture into a glass and garnish with a mint leaf.

steps.step: Scoop the flesh from the passionfruit into a cocktail shaker.
Add the 3 sprigs of mint and muddle with the passionfruit in the bottom of the cocktail shaker.
Add the gin and honey, then fill the shaker with ice. Shake for 10 seconds.
Strain the mixture into a glass and garnish with a mint leaf.
